languages.text: "Не советую. Я видел, что наши "друзья" сделали с придурком, который решил помочиться на одно из этих каменных лиц. Ты не хочешь оказаться на его месте".

traits.locale_text: "Не советую. Я видел, что наши "друзья" сделали с придурком, который решил помочиться на одно из этих каменных лиц. Ты не хочешь оказаться на его месте".

languages.text: "Don't. I saw what our 'friends' did to the idiot who thought it'd be a good idea to piss on one of these stone faces. You don't want to be that guy."
languages.original_text: "Не советую. Я видел, что наши "друзья" сделали с придурком, который решил помочиться на одно из этих каменных лиц. Ты не хочешь оказаться на его месте".

traits.locale_text: "Don't. I saw what our 'friends' did to the idiot who thought it'd be a good idea to piss on one of these stone faces. You don't want to be that guy."
"Don't. I saw what our 'friends' did to the idiot who thought it'd be a good idea to piss on one of these stone faces. You don't want to be that guy."
"Don't. I saw what our 'friends' did to the idiot who thought it'd be a good idea to piss on one of these stone faces. You don't want to be that guy."
"Don't. I saw what our 'friends' did to the idiot who thought it'd be a good idea to piss on one of these stone faces. You don't want to be that guy."
"Don't. I saw what our 'friends' did to the idiot who thought it'd be a good idea to piss on one of these stone faces. You don't want to be that guy."

languages.text: “别这样。有个白痴觉得在这些石像脸上撒尿是个好主意，于是我亲眼看到了我们的‘朋友’是如何处置那家伙的。你绝对不会想落得同样的下场。”
languages.original_text: "Don't. I saw what our 'friends' did to the idiot who thought it'd be a good idea to piss on one of these stone faces. You don't want to be that guy."

traits.locale_text: “别这样。有个白痴觉得在这些石像脸上撒尿是个好主意，于是我亲眼看到了我们的‘朋友’是如何处置那家伙的。你绝对不会想落得同样的下场。”

languages.text: «No. Ya he visto lo que nuestros "amigos" le hicieron al idiota que creyó que sería gracioso mear sobre una de esas caras de piedra. No quieres acabar como él».
languages.original_text: "Don't. I saw what our 'friends' did to the idiot who thought it'd be a good idea to piss on one of these stone faces. You don't want to be that guy."

traits.locale_text: «No. Ya he visto lo que nuestros "amigos" le hicieron al idiota que creyó que sería gracioso mear sobre una de esas caras de piedra. No quieres acabar como él».

languages.text: 「やめとけ。名案だと言ってこの石のツラにションベンかけたバカに『友人』がやったことを見たけど、そいつと同類になりたかないだろ」
languages.original_text: "Don't. I saw what our 'friends' did to the idiot who thought it'd be a good idea to piss on one of these stone faces. You don't want to be that guy."

traits.locale_text: 「やめとけ。名案だと言ってこの石のツラにションベンかけたバカに『友人』がやったことを見たけど、そいつと同類になりたかないだろ」

languages.text: "Lasst es. Ich habe gesehen, was unsere 'Freunde' mit dem Idioten gemacht haben, der es für eine gute Idee hielt, auf eines dieser Steingesichter zu pissen. In dessen Haut wollt Ihr nicht stecken."
languages.original_text: "Don't. I saw what our 'friends' did to the idiot who thought it'd be a good idea to piss on one of these stone faces. You don't want to be that guy."

traits.locale_text: "Lasst es. Ich habe gesehen, was unsere 'Freunde' mit dem Idioten gemacht haben, der es für eine gute Idee hielt, auf eines dieser Steingesichter zu pissen. In dessen Haut wollt Ihr nicht stecken."

languages.text: « Non. J'ai vu ce que nos "amis" ont fait au crétin qui s'est dit que ce serait une bonne idée de pisser sur un de ces visages de pierre. Crois-moi, tu veux pas te retrouver à sa place. »
languages.original_text: "Don't. I saw what our 'friends' did to the idiot who thought it'd be a good idea to piss on one of these stone faces. You don't want to be that guy."

traits.locale_text: « Non. J'ai vu ce que nos "amis" ont fait au crétin qui s'est dit que ce serait une bonne idée de pisser sur un de ces visages de pierre. Crois-moi, tu veux pas te retrouver à sa place. »

languages.text: "Sakın. Bu taş suratların birine işemenin iyi bir fikir olduğunu düşünen dangalağa 'dostlarımızın' ne yaptığını gördüm. O arkadaşın yerinde olmak istemezdin."
languages.original_text: "Don't. I saw what our 'friends' did to the idiot who thought it'd be a good idea to piss on one of these stone faces. You don't want to be that guy."

traits.locale_text: "Sakın. Bu taş suratların birine işemenin iyi bir fikir olduğunu düşünen dangalağa 'dostlarımızın' ne yaptığını gördüm. O arkadaşın yerinde olmak istemezdin."
